meanings.sent1: The rough, unslick surface of the rock made it hard to climb.
meanings.sent2: The unslick road was bumpy and full of potholes.
meanings.sent3: She tried to slide down the unslick slide, but ended up stuck halfway.
meanings.sent4: His unslick manners made him stand out in the elegant party.
meanings.sent5: The unslick paint job on the car was peeling and chipped.

meanings.sent1: The plain, unslick design of the furniture gave the room a minimalist look.
meanings.sent2: Her unslick outfit consisted of jeans and a plain t-shirt.
meanings.sent3: He attempted a fancy dance move but ended up with an unslick stumble.
meanings.sent4: The unslick presentation failed to impress the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unslick haircut made him look like he just rolled out of bed.
